sentences.sContent: He moved to Bogotá, where he lived with relatives and worked in an auto muffler shop.
sentences.sContent_eng: He moved to Bogotá, where he lived with relatives and worked in an auto muffler shop.
sentences.sCn: 随后，他搬到波哥达，与亲戚住在一起，并在一家汽车消声器商店工作。

sentences.sContent: It bounced up under the car and tore off the muffler of my ancient Ford station wagon.
sentences.sContent_eng: It bounced up under the car and tore off the muffler of my ancient Ford station wagon.
sentences.sCn: 那锥标弹了起来，扯下了我那台老式的福特旅行车的消音器。

synos.tran: 围巾；[声]消音器；面纱；厚手套

words.tran: 低沉的声音；消声器；包裹物（如头巾，围巾等）；唇鼻部
蒙住；裹住；抑制；发低沉的声音

trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment on a vehicle that makes the noise from the engine quieter
